definitions.definition: Older maternal mother; older sister of one’s wife.
Younger maternal mother; younger sister of one’s wife.
Younger paternal uncle; younger brother of one’s husband.
Elder paternal uncle; elder brother of one’s husband.

meanings.example: Bere racho rakatiza mushure mekuona vanhu.

definitions.definition: To bear; carry on one’s back.

meanings.example: Bhambu racho harina kuputika panguva yakatarwa.
Ndiri kudya banana rakanaka mangwanani ano.
Iye munhu anobhowa chaizvo kana ari mumusangano.
Maziso ake ari kubwaira nekuda kwechiedza.

definitions.definition: To be cautious; to be clever.

meanings.example: Ndiri kuverenga chikamu chekupedzisira chebhuku rangu.
Zvipo izvi zvinokwana, uye zvinopa chipa.
Ndakaona chiremba wemazino kuti aongorore dambudziko rangu.
Ari kudemba kuisa mari yake mubhizimisi risina pundutso.
Denga remba ravo rakagadzirwa nezvimwewo zvinhu zvakasimba.
Ndiri kudya dhizeti mushure mekudya chikuru.
Dhongi racho riri kutakura zvinhu zvakawanda.
Pane dota rakasara mushure mekupisa miti.
Duramazwi rangu rakabatsira mukutsvaga mazwi matsva.
Dokotera akanditora ekisi reyi yekuongorora matumbu.
Fenicha iri mumba iri yakanaka zvikuru.
Ari kurwara nefivha mushure mekufamba kure.
Fodya iyi iri kugadzirwa muchirimwa chemumba.
Pane furo riri kubva muchikapu chemvura.
Gakava riri pakati pevanhu vaviri rakapedzwa nemutongi.
Mvura yakagasa mushure mekudonha kwenguva refu.
Ari kuridza gitare rake pamberi pevanhu.
Pane gonye mumunda uri kudya miriwo.
Ari kudzidza kutamba gorufu panzvimbo yepamusoro.
Gudo riri mumakomo ari kutyisidzira vanhu.
Mumunda makaitika gukuravhu mushure memvura zhinji.
Ndakatora gumbeze rangu kuti ndirare zvakanaka.
Izvi zvakandigumbura nekuti handina kugamuchira chinhu chakanaka.
Tine vanhu gumi vari kupinda mumusangano.
Hanganwa yake iri kukanganisa basa rake.
Hohwa iyi yakanatswa zvakanaka isati yabikwa.
Vana vari kugara muhositeri iri padhuze.
Mudzimai uyu akazivikanwa se hure munharaunda yavo.
Hurumende iri kushanda kugadzirisa nyaya dzeupfumi.
Vakanzwa hwa hwa hwavo pakupedzisa basa.
Ndine mota idzva yandakawana svondo rino.
Igo rakatanga kuvaka dendere pedyo nemusha.
Izwi rake rine simba uye rakanaka.
Jongwe rangu rinoridza mazuva ese mangwanani.
Kamba yacho iri kufamba zvishoma nezvishoma.
Kirasi yedu ine vana makumi maviri.
Ndaka kiya gonhi remba yangu usiku.
Koparetvihi yavo iri kubatsira varimi vemuno.
Ndiri kudzidza kukoreji iri muguta guru.
Takakorokotedza mwana wenyu pane zvake zvabuda zvakanaka.
Takatarisa kuora kwezuva kwakanaka kubva mudenga.
Chivakwa ichi chakavakwa makore zana apfuura.
Makwenene ari kuita kuti vhudzi rake rinetseke.
Manheru akanaka, zvese zviri kufamba zvakanaka.
Mate ake akatanga kubuda nekuda kwemishonga.
Mbeva iri mumba medu ichidya chikafu.
Mhuka dzemusango dzakawanda dzinoonekwa pedyo nenzvimbo iyi.
Ari mutsva uye ndiye motsi wechikwata.
Mubereki wangu ndiye shamwari yangu huru.
Mudzi wemuti uyu uri pasi pemvura.
Mudzidzisi vedu vakati tinofanira kudzidza zvakasimba.
Mugadziri weshangu akagadzira shangu dzangu dzakatyoka.
Muganho wemunda wedu unopera pamuti uyu.
Muimbi uyu ane izwi rakanaka zvikuru.
Muka mangwanani kuitira kuti usarasikirwa nenguva.
Munhukadzi uyu ndiye mutungamiri weboka redu.
Muridzi wemunda uyu ari kuenda kunze kwenyika.
Murume wangu ari kumba pari zvino.
Musana wangu unorwadza pandinoita basa rinorema.
Musikana anoshanda mumba anotsvaira imba yese.
Muvaki akapedza kuvaka imba iyi mwedzi wapfuura.
Mwanasikana wangu anoda kuvaka ramangwana rake.
Mwedzi uno unenge une zuva rakakosha.
Tichafamba nendege kubva kuHarare kuenda kuJohannesburg.
Mwedzi waNdira une zuva reKisimusi dzevaKristu.
Tine mapfumbamwe, tapotsa tawana nomwe chete.
Haana kufanira kunyengedza vanhu nevimbiso dzenhema.
Nyepa haafaniri kuva chikamu cheupenyu hwemunhu.
Basa iri nyore kuita kana uchinyatsonzwisisa.
Chiedza chacho chakanga chioneka kubva kure.
Ndine pasipoti yangu yekufamba kunze kwenyika.
Pfungwa dzake dzakaenderera mberi nezvebasa rake.
Pfuti yake yakashandiswa panguva yemhuka dzinokuvadza.
Purani yavo yekuvaka imba yakafambira mberi.
Haafaniri kuita mapusa mune zvine basa.
Baba vakarambidza vana kuenda kure nemusha.
Ndakabvumirana kuti ndirende imba iyi kwemwedzi mitatu.

Ndakabatsira shamwari yangu kuera vana vake.
Ndakakwira rifiti kuti ndisvike pachikamu chechitatu.
Rima rakapinda mushure mekunge chiedza chadzima.
Rinda rake riri pedyo nerimwe remhuri yake.
Ticharonga mabasa edu kuti awedzere kubudirira.
Rufaro rwavo rwaiita kuti vamwe vafare.
Rutendo rwake rwaive rwakasimba muna Mwari.
Ruva racho raive rakasvibirira uye rakanaka.
Rwendo rwacho rwaive rurefu asi runonakidza.
Senduro dzake dzakanga dzakatengwa kuSouth Africa.
Vana vatanhatu vakawedzera nevaviri, zvino vava sere.
Akashama nyai mushure mekurara usiku hwese.
Shiri dzakatiza huni huru dzavira pasi.
Shumba yakatanga kurova mhuka dzakasununguka musango.
Siketi yake yaive yakanakidzwa nevanhu vazhinji.
Haafanire kusiya mhuri yake panguva yakaoma.
Ndakatadzira shamwari yangu asi ndakakumbira ruregerero.
Tarisiro yake yaive yekuwana basa rakanaka.
Ndakatarisira kuti munhu uyu achauya panguva yakatarwa.
Ndinoonga uye ndinotenda nekuda kwemubatsiro wako.
Akatendera vana kuti vaende kunoshanyira shamwari.
Bhuku reTestamende idzva rakakurumbira kuvanhu vakawanda.

Akageza mbatya dzakanga dzisina kuchena nekuda kwetsvina.

Haana kufanira kuita zvakaipa nekuda kweuipi hwake.
Akaunganidza vanhu pamwe chete kuti vaone mutambo.
